mapper.insert: insert into db_calculate_temp (SID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYQUANTITY, EBAYHITCOUNT, UPDATETIME1, UPDATETIME, CALCULATEFLAG) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebayquantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ebayhitcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updatetime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{calculateflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_calculate_temp set EBAYITEMID = #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EBAYQUANTITY = #{ebayquantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EBAYHITCOUNT = #{ebayhitcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATETIME1 = #{updatetime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CALCULATEFLAG = #{calculateflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYQUANTITY, EBAYHITCOUNT, UPDATETIME1, UPDATETIME, CALCULATEFLAG from db_calculate_temp
